title: There is / There are
description: Слушайте фразы с «there is» и «there are» в простых ситуациях.
short_description: Предложения с there is / there are.

tasks.audioText: He looks at the street map. There is a bank near here.
tasks.transcript: There is a bank near here.

options.text: There is a bank near here.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says a bank exists near here. Other options change number, state, or the subject.

tasks.audioText: They walk in the park. They see many people. There are many people in the park.
tasks.transcript: There are many people in the park.

options.text: There are many people in the park.
There is one person in the park.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says many people are in the park. Other options change quantity or the situation.

tasks.audioText: She opens the fridge at home. There is no milk.
tasks.explanation: The sentence says milk is not there. Other options say the opposite or other actions.

tasks.audioText: At the shop the shelf is full. There are five boxes on the shelf.
tasks.transcript: There are five boxes on the shelf.

options.text: There are five boxes on the shelf.
There is one box on the shelf.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says five boxes exist on the shelf. Other options change the number or condition.

tasks.audioText: He looks at the menu in the cafe. There is a soup of the day.
tasks.transcript: There is a soup of the day.

options.text: There is a soup of the day.
There are soups of the day.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says the soup of the day exists on the menu. Other options change number or the action.

tasks.audioText: They enter the hotel lobby. There is a small desk near the door.
tasks.transcript: There is a small desk near the door.

options.text: There is a small desk near the door.
There are many desks near the door.

tasks.explanation: The sentence states a small desk exists near the door. Other options change number or location.

tasks.audioText: At the bus stop he reads the timetable. There is one bus every hour.
tasks.transcript: There is one bus every hour.

options.text: There is one bus every hour.
There are buses every five minutes.

tasks.explanation: The sentence describes the schedule: one bus each hour. Other options change frequency or topic.

tasks.audioText: She checks the classroom. There are twenty students in the class.
tasks.transcript: There are twenty students in the class.

options.text: There are twenty students in the class.
There is one student in the class.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says twenty students are present. Other options change number or the situation.

tasks.audioText: He comes home late and looks around. There is a light in the kitchen.
tasks.transcript: There is a light in the kitchen.

options.text: There is a light in the kitchen.
There are lights in the kitchen.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says a light exists in the kitchen. Other options change number or the state.

tasks.audioText: At the market she looks at the fruit. There are fresh oranges on the stall.
tasks.transcript: There are fresh oranges on the stall.

options.text: There are fresh oranges on the stall.
There is a fresh orange on the stall.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says fresh oranges exist on the stall. Other options change number, condition, or action.

tasks.audioText: He goes to the clinic and asks. There is no doctor now.
tasks.explanation: The sentence says a doctor is not present now. Other options state the opposite or different events.

tasks.audioText: At the post office he asks the clerk. There are many letters today.
tasks.explanation: The sentence says many letters exist today. Other options change number or action.

tasks.audioText: He enters the office and looks around. There is a new computer on the desk.
tasks.transcript: There is a new computer on the desk.

options.text: There is a new computer on the desk.
There are new computers on the desk.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says one new computer exists on the desk. Other options change number or action.

tasks.audioText: At the gym he looks in the corner. There is a towel on the bench.
tasks.transcript: There is a towel on the bench.

options.text: There is a towel on the bench.
There are towels on the bench.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says a towel exists on the bench. Other options change number or situation.

tasks.audioText: He talks to the officer at the station. There is a report on the desk.
tasks.transcript: There is a report on the desk.

options.text: There is a report on the desk.
There are reports on the desk.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says a report exists on the desk. Other options change number or action.
